concept.title: 552.215-71 Examination of Records by GSA (Multiple Award Schedule).

conbody.p: As prescribed in 515.209-70(c) insert the following clause:

The Contractor agrees that the Administrator of General Services or any duly authorized representative shall have access to and the right to examine any books, documents, papers and records of the Contractor involving transactions related to this contract for overbillings, billing errors, compliance with the Price Reduction clause and compliance with the Industrial Funding Fee and Sales Reporting clause of this contract. This authority shall expire 3years after final payment. The basic contract and each option shall be treated as separate contracts for purposes of applying this clause.
